channel.title: Forum picture
channel.description:
a short problem
how can i add a picture in my topic?
Thanks,

item.title: Forum picture
item.dc:creator: @lummy172 lummy172
item.description:
@lummy172 wrote:

you need to host the picture on photobucket imageshack etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum picture
item.dc:creator: @chessy019 chessy019
item.description:
@chessy019 wrote:

Also if you want to edit it:
You open up MS paint and copy your picture and paste it into paint…now edit it the way you want and save it then go to imageshack (make sure you got imageshack toolbar) and upload images…then choose watever your file name was and upload it…then go to imageshack and check it out!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Forum picture
item.dc:creator: @brionnn brionnn
item.description:
@brionnn wrote:

Step 5, it takes very long to upload.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum picture
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

Step 1: Take a screenshot with the button “Prt Scrn” somewhere on your keyboard.
Step 2: Open a program such as paint and press Ctrl V or right click and paste.
Step 3: Save your picture you took somewhere on your computer
Step 4: Go to http://www.imageshack.us and click browse, find your file and double click on it.
Step 5: Upload the picture and wait till its done loading
Step 6: Now its done with loading and you will see some links, just take the normal link or the normal link with IMG tags.
Step 7: Post it on the Forums

Credits to God of ikiliki for this this was in his topic in server advertisment section.

Read full topic
